data.name: Calling a taxi to a client(s)
data.value: Calling a taxi to a client(s)
data.comment: Calling a taxi to a client(s)

data.name: Banquet service description
data.value: This service includes the following points, such as the organization and holding of banquets, wedding receptions, corporate parties, anniversaries.A separate menu for such cases is also included.

data.name: Catering description
data.value: The catering service includes the preparation and delivery of dishes to the selected location, where guests can enjoy dishes created by professional chefs.

data.name: Catering description 2
data.value: The restaurant staff also provides high-quality serving and service to create an unforgettable atmosphere and experience.

data.name: Conducting musical performances and show programs description
data.value: This service offers the organization and holding of exciting musical performances and show programs. Regardless of whether you need a live musical performance, a dance show or other entertainment performances, the event will be truly memorable.

data.name: Providing a children's menu and entertainment for children description
data.value: This service presents a special children's menu and entertainment activities. The menu offers a variety of healthy and delicious dishes that children will enjoy.There is also a play area for children.

data.name: Wine list description
data.value: It provides a wide selection of wines of various varieties, including red, white, pink and sparkling wines. Our experienced sommelier will be happy to help you choose the wine that is perfect for your preferences.

data.name: Organization of karaoke parties description
data.value: This service offers the organization of karaoke parties, which bring a lot of fun and entertainment. There is a wide selection of songs, professional sound equipment and a cozy atmosphere so that each guest can perform their favorite hits and spend an unforgettable time with friends.

data.name: Wi-Fi and comfortable working conditions description
data.value: This service offers free Wi-Fi access to work in a comfortable environment. Conditions have been created for comfortable work or for holding business meetings in the institution.

data.name: Organization of culinary contests and tournaments description
data.value: The organization of culinary contests and tournaments is one of the services offered. An atmosphere of competition is created and interesting culinary events are organized for the guests.

data.name: Prom and party organization services description
data.value: Proms and parties are provided. An unforgettable atmosphere is created and every detail is thought through to make the event special and memorable.

data.name: Calling Description
data.value: This service is used by the restaurant so that customers can arrive at the restaurant or go home without having to call a taxi on their own.
